content.query:
-- Select input scoring data and assign aliases.
SELECT
        [Claim_FIR_No],
        [Claim_Type],
        [Hospitalization_Type],
        [Class_of_Accommodation],
        [Procedure],
        [Diagnosis],
        [PolicyNo],
        [Policy_Type],
        [member_code],
        [Gender],
        CAST([Age] AS [bigint]) AS [Age],
        [Hospital],
        [Corporate],
        CAST([Length_of_Stay] AS [bigint]) AS [Length_of_Stay],
        CAST([Claim_Amount] AS [bigint]) AS [Claim_Amount],
        [HospitalCity],
        [HospitalState],
        [MemberCity],
        [MemberState],
        CAST([Age_Group] AS [bigint]) AS [Age_group],
        CAST([Claim_Amt_Grp] AS [bigint]) AS [Claim_amt_grp],
        CAST([day] AS [bigint]) AS [day],
        CAST([year] AS [bigint]) AS [year],
        CAST([month] AS [bigint]) AS [month]
    INTO [dbo].[claims_summary_modelInput_03022022] FROM [dbo].[ClaimsSummary_ModelInput]
